title: HoP 293 - The Good Wife - Gender and Sexuality in the Middle Ages
itunes:title: HoP 293 - The Good Wife - Gender and Sexuality in the Middle Ages
description: Medieval attitudes towards homosexuality, sex and chastity, and the status of women. Authors discussed include Aquinas, Catherine of Siena, and Chaucer.
